news.title: Treasury Secretary Bessent says a stock market decline won't deter the U.S. from taking strong action against China
news.summary: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent insisted that the U.S. won't change its negotiating stance on China due to stock market volatility.

news.title: Bank of America tops expectations on 43% surge in investment banking revenue
news.summary: Bank of America's Wall Street businesses helped fuel the quarter's results. Like its peers, Bank of America has seen strong results from its Wall Street business.

news.title: Apple announces new MacBook Pro laptops with updated chip
news.summary: Apple announced new MacBook Pro models on Wednesday with an updated M5 chip. The chip allows them to run faster than their predecessors. Apple also announced a new iWatch with a faster processor.

news.title: Nscale eyes IPO amid fresh $14 billion deal with Microsoft
news.summary: The AI cloud company could IPO towards the back end of 2026, a spokesperson confirmed to CNBC. The company could go public in the second half of next year.

news.title: Morgan Stanley posts massive third-quarter earnings beat
news.summary: Wall Street-centric banks like Morgan Stanley and peer Goldman Sachs are in an ideal moneymaking environment. Morgan Stanley is the world's largest bank. Goldman Sachs is the second largest.

news.title: ‘Expensive, but not nutty.’ Howard Marks on U.S. stocks and the one thing investors should be doing right now.
news.summary: Oaktree co-founder Howard Marks says investors should start taking some “chips off the table,” after a strong run for markets.

news.title: Crypto hype is affecting everything from real estate to Treasurys. Here’s how to play it.
news.summary: Tokenization is unlikely to make you rich overnight. But it could make your portfolio more transparent, liquid and efficient. For more information on Tokenization click here.

news.title: One of the last holdouts on Nvidia’s stock now predicts 78% upside. Here’s the thesis.
news.summary: HSBC analysts now think Nvidia has the potential to vastly exceed Wall Street expectations for data-center revenue as the company’s customer base broadens.

news.title: Bank of America rides 43% jump in investment-banking revenue to big profit beat
news.summary: Bank's net interest income hits a record and CEO Brian Moynihan cites strength across the board. Stock rises toward an 18-year high.

news.title: ‘I’m stumped’: I put $3,000 on my credit card during a vacation and my credit score plunged. Why is it so volatile?
news.summary: “Doesn’t a 30-year history of good credit count for anything?” he asks. ‘Doesn't a 30 year history ofgood credit count?’ “I’m not sure,’ he adds.
